DOC.brief_summary: This study will compare the ability of a single-dose of a novel ibuprofen formulation to relieve pain compared to placebo and standard ibuprofen in the treatment of tension-type headache
DOC.criteria: Males and females at least 18 years to 65 years of age A diagnosis of an episodic tensiontype headache, as defined by the International Headache Society Pregnancy or breastfeeding Alcohol or substance abuse Any serious medical or psychiatric disorder
